trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di elementi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" /> defines the allowable child content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Span" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" /> definisce il contenuto figlio consentito degli elementi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Span" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> creation is only permitted inside an element that owns an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> or a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> la creazione è consentita solo all'interno di un elemento che possiede un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>.

trans-unit.source: As such, an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> cannot be instantiated directly and has no default or overloaded constructor.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> non è possibile creare direttamente istanze e non dispone di alcun valore predefinito o costruttore di overload.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Run" /> element to the collection.
Text set as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text" /> property for the implicit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Run" />.
trans-unit.target: Testo impostato come proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Run" /> implicito.

trans-unit.source: Adds an implicit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Run" /> element with the given text, supplied as a <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Run" /> implicito con il testo specificato, fornito come oggetto <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> set as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer.Child" /> property for the implicit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> impostato come proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer.Child" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer" /> implicito.

trans-unit.source: Adds an implicit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer" /> with the supplied <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> already in it.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer" /> implicito con l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> fornito già al suo interno.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> element within this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il primo elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> all'interno dell'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> element within this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Primo elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> all'interno dell'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> element within this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ultimo elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> all'interno dell'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The last <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> element within this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ultimo elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> all'interno dell'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection" />.
